description: Your jack of all trails. Efficient on the uphill and forgiving on the downhill, the Habit Carbon 2 eats trails for breakfast and then goes back for brunch. With full suspension, you can jump into a mixed bag of terrain. From all day missions to quick post-work sessions, this 29er is ready to mix it up.Carbon and SmartForm C1 alloy frame, with a slack headtube angle and versatile trail geometry.RockShox Pike Select+ RC suspension fork, with 140mm of travel.RockShox Select Deluxe+ RT rear shock, with 130mm of travel.1x12 drive train pairs a 30T chain ring with a 10-50T cassette.SRAM Eagle GX and X01 groupset, with Truvativ Stylo crank.Hydraulic disc brakes.SRAM Eagle XX1 chain.Dropper seat post.Front tire: Maxxis Minion DHF 29 x 2.5 (tubeless ready).Rear tire: Maxxis High Roller II 29 x 2.3 (tubeless ready).Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase.
name: Cannondale Habit Carbon 2 Bicycle - Unisex

Frame: BallisTec Carbon front triangle with Smartform C1 Alloy swingarm
